price: او همدغه شان موږ هغه په څرګندو آيتونو سره نازل كړ او دا چې الله چاته وغواړي لاره ورښيي.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يُرِيدُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-anna al-laha yahdī man yurīdu
